title: Video Converter
description: Convert between MP4, AVI, MKV, MOV, and other video formats

sections.title: About Video Conversion
content: Convert video files between popular formats while maintaining quality and optimizing for different platforms.

sections.title: Supported Formats
content: MP4 - Most compatible format for web and mobile
MKV - Open-source container with advanced features

sections.title: Common Use Cases
content: Convert AVI to MP4 for better compatibility
Convert MOV to MP4 for web publishing
Reduce file size while maintaining quality
